spotlights.name: Kumar Gaurav Tiwari
spotlights.title: Founder
spotlights.bio: Passionate technologist and community builder with expertise in Python, Web Development, and Machine Learning. Founded Tech Dev Club to create a supportive environment for developers to learn and grow together.
spotlights.achievement: Founded Tech Dev Club and grew it to a thriving global community
spotlights.impact: Created a platform for developers to learn, collaborate, and grow their skills through mentorship and community support

projects.name: Tech Dev Club Platform
projects.description: Community platform for developers to connect and collaborate

projects.name: Developer Resources Hub
projects.description: Curated collection of learning resources for developers

spotlights.testimonial: Building Tech Dev Club has been an incredible journey. Seeing our community grow and impact so many developers' careers has been the most rewarding experience of my professional life.

spotlights.name: Brajesh Kumar
spotlights.title: Co-Founder
spotlights.bio: Creative CSE undergrad with a drive to build scalable, impactful solutions at the intersection of AI, web, and community. I blend code, design, and real-world insight to empower users and teams globally.
spotlights.achievement: Developed innovative AI-driven solutions for community engagement and learning
spotlights.impact: Mentored 50+ developers and contributed to multiple open-source projects that serve the developer community

projects.name: Agrotech AI
projects.description: Smart AI-driven platform empowering farmers with actionable agricultural insights and crop management

projects.name: EdTech Community Platform
projects.description: Interactive, gamified learning network connecting students, mentors, and professionals

projects.name: Agrilearn AI
projects.description: Modern EdTech brand merging AI with personalized learning

spotlights.testimonial: The collaborative spirit at Tech Dev Club has pushed me to share my knowledge more openly and learn from amazing developers across different domains.

spotlights.name: Vani Sen
spotlights.title: Community Manager
spotlights.bio: Experienced community manager with a passion for AI and machine learning. Dedicated to fostering an inclusive and supportive environment for developers of all skill levels.
spotlights.achievement: Founded AI4Tomorrow non-profit and recognized as a Youth Fellow by UNESCO
spotlights.impact: Built and nurtured a vibrant community of developers, facilitating knowledge sharing and collaboration

projects.name: AI4Tomorrow
projects.description: Non-profit organization focused on AI education and accessibility

projects.name: Community Engagement Framework
projects.description: Structured approach to building and maintaining tech communities

spotlights.testimonial: Tech Dev Club gave me a platform to share my passion for AI and connect with like-minded developers who care about building inclusive technology.

spotlights.name: Bhavya Shukla
spotlights.title: Team Leader
spotlights.bio: I'm a Computer Science student specializing in IoT, passionate about tech, problem-solving, and innovation. I enjoy building full-stack projects, working with cloud platforms, and exploring AI through prompt engineering.
spotlights.achievement: Qualified first round of Smart India Hackathon 2023 for a dropout analysis solution
spotlights.impact: Led multiple successful tech initiatives and mentored junior developers in the community

projects.name: IoT-Based Single-Phase Power Failure Monitoring System
projects.description: ESP32-powered real-time monitoring with web notification

projects.name: JARVIS AI Assistant
projects.description: Python chatbot with API integration and voice interface

spotlights.testimonial: Being part of Tech Dev Club has allowed me to grow both technically and as a leader. The supportive environment encourages innovation and continuous learning.
